title: Simulation-Based Scientific Creativity Development Program for Gifted STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and comprehension of experimental inquiry methods
context.additional_context: Project execution in a resource-constrained technical environment using smartphone-based VR applications.

learning_goals: Learners can construct creative experimental designs that solve scientific problems by applying a STEM approach.
Learners can analyze scientific phenomena in VR simulation environments and derive data-driven conclusions.
Learners can demonstrate interdisciplinary problem-solving competencies through collaborative projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
